# VIMAGE_CGAFFINETRANSFORM_IS_AVAILABLE

**Global Variable**

Defined as `1` if Core Graphics affine transforms and related functions are supported on the current architecture and in the current SDK, else undefined. See [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vImage_CGAffineTransform] for more information.

## Declaration

```swift
var VIMAGE_CGAFFINETRANSFORM_IS_AVAILABLE: Int32 { get }
```

## Constants

- **VIMAGE_AFFINETRANSFORM_DOUBLE_IS_AVAILABLE**: Defined as `1` if double-precision affine transforms and related functions are supported on the current architecture and in the current SDK, else undefined. See [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vImage_AffineTransform_Double] for more information.
